name: gasket
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a flat piece of soft material or rubber that is put between two joined metal surfaces to prevent gas, oil, or steam from escaping: blow a gasket The gasket has blown (= allowed gas, oil, or steam to escape). See also
blow a fuse/gasket old-fashioned informal
Garry518/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
